name: Christmas Songs & Bells Music Box
description:
This is a very special date for many people around the world, and so we created this beautiful app with the best Christmas songs.
This free music app is different then others. You can not just playing best collection of Christmas tunes but there are many live animations inside the 3 christmas themes and 4 music mode with many holly melodies.
One of the best theme is the real time live snow falling background with Santa Claus' Reindeer.
Christmas Bell sound effect and last but not least the unique animated musical toy!
This app also brings together some of the most beautiful free songs, which can be used for sleeping, relax.
Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the holly sounds and relax or sleep better.
You don’t need to wait Santa Claus to put nice gift under the Christmas Tree.

Features:
- 20 Christmas music tunes for free
- Relaxing snow falling background with Santa Claus' Reindeer
- Cool music box option in Endless mode
- 10 Christmas chor songs
- Free Bell mode with 10 bell sounds (you can touch the bells as well)
- Surprise mode, where you can play with unique musical toy
- Beautiful HD graphics compatible with tablets and mobiles

Join Christmas holiday celebration with this the most popular sounds!
If you like these free sounds there is also an option to share app with your friends and family through popular social networks, email or sms, or simply you can just use your headset to enjoy cool tunes. Use the more apps button at the bottom of the main menu to check out our other great apps and games.
Last but not least, application has been tested on many HD devices to ensure the best possible user experience.
